content: Set terminal title for refactoring work
Create unified LaunchResult enum in launch_common.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after LaunchResult creation
Extract duplicate path extraction logic to support/mod.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after path extraction
Create LaunchConfig trait in launch_common.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after LaunchConfig trait
Run cargo clippy after foundational changes
Fix any clippy issues
Create generic launch_target function in launch_common.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_target
Create AppLaunchConfig implementation
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after AppLaunchConfig
Create ExampleLaunchConfig implementation
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after ExampleLaunchConfig
Run cargo clippy after config implementations
Fix any clippy issues
Refactor launch_bevy_app to use new structure
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_app refactor
Refactor launch_bevy_example to use new structure
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after launch_bevy_example refactor
Run cargo clippy after all refactoring
Fix any clippy issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
Task subagent for code review of changes
